A receipt for the state-palsie. Or, A direction for the setling the government of the nation: delivered in a sermon upon Proverbs 25.5. By S.S. Shaw, Samuel, 1635-1696.
[8], 19, [1] p.
printed for Henry Mortlocke at the Phœnix in Pauls Church-yard, neer the Little North-door, London : MDCLX. [1660]
S.S. = Samuel Shaw. Annotation on Thomason copy: "Feb: 2. 1659"; the 'X' in the imprint date has been crossed out. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
